Consumable.Name: Elixir of Shadows
Consumable.Description: A mysterious potion that cloaks the drinker in shadows, granting temporary invisibility.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Essential for sneaking past the guards in the Castle of Silence

Consumable.Name: Potion of Giant's Strength
Consumable.Description: This potion temporarily endows the drinker with the legendary strength of a giant.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Used to move the ancient boulder blocking the entrance to the Hidden Caverns

Consumable.Name: Phoenix Feather
Consumable.Description: A single feather from a phoenix, burning with a life force that can revive the fallen.
Consumable.Effects: Revives the player with full health upon death
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Critical for surviving the encounter with the Dark Lord Morith
